text: Kauna hai jihara tuhanu jagala ate dari'avam de haneri'am vica raha dikha'unda hai. Ate kauna hai jihara apani di'alata tom pahilam havavam nu khusakhabari bana ke bhejada hai. Ki alaha de barabara ko'i hora pujana yoga hai, alaha, usa tom bahuta sresata hai, jisa nu uha pujanayoga manade hana
